Tomboy.TaskManager.Tests.NotesCreationManager

Tomboy.TaskManager.Tests.NotesCreationManager Class Reference

This class simplifies the creation of notes for the TaskManager addin unit tests. If you want to use it simply add your own note XML in the test folder. In your tests you can then instantiate copies of this XML file represented by Note objects. More...

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static void CreateNote (string fromTemplate, out Note note, out TaskManagerNoteAddin addin)
 Creates Tomboy Notes from a given Template File (embedded as a ressource in the assembly) in a temporary directory.
static void LoadNote (string fromFile, out Note note, out TaskManagerNoteAddin addin, bool delete)
 Returns a note object and its taskmanager addin instance for a given note XML file.
static void DeleteNoteFiles ()
 Deletes all corresponding note XML files which where created with CreateNote before.

Detailed Description

This class simplifies the creation of notes for the TaskManager addin unit tests. If you want to use it simply add your own note XML in the test folder. In your tests you can then instantiate copies of this XML file represented by Note objects.

out Note  note,
out TaskManagerNoteAddin  addin 
) [static]

Creates Tomboy Notes from a given Template File (embedded as a ressource in the assembly) in a temporary directory.

Parameters:
fromTemplate A System.String identifying the template we'd like to use.
note note Note will be set to a new Note instance with the contents of the template note.
addin The TaskManagerNoteAddin is wired together with the note to ensure that the note has the TaskManager functionality.

Deletes all corresponding note XML files which where created with CreateNote before.

delete A System.Boolean, if true the file will be deleted on a call to DeleteNoteFiles
